name: Kings of Con
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Rob & Rich became regulars on the convention circuit after guest starring on a cult TV series. Now, follow them behind the autograph where you’ll discover that the strangest people at conventions are the actors paid to be there. Based on their real life experience hosting Supernatural Conventions, Rich and Rob play caricatures of themselves cavorting through the con world: Rich, a thrice divorced former actor who’s love of the game is fueled by the faux fame he experiences at conventions, and Rob, a divorcee-to-be who is back on the circuit to cover the costs of his failed marriage and stalled career.
about_the_game: Rob & Rich became regulars on the convention circuit after guest starring on a cult TV series. Now, follow them behind the autograph where you’ll discover that the strangest people at conventions are the actors paid to be there. Based on their real life experience hosting Supernatural Conventions, Rich and Rob play caricatures of themselves cavorting through the con world: Rich, a thrice divorced former actor who’s love of the game is fueled by the faux fame he experiences at conventions, and Rob, a divorcee-to-be who is back on the circuit to cover the costs of his failed marriage and stalled career.
short_description: Rob & Rich became regulars on the convention circuit after guest starring on a cult TV series. Now, follow them behind the autograph where you’ll discover that the strangest people at conventions are the actors paid to be there.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7
  • Processeur : Un processeur Intel Core 2 ou l'équivalent d'AMD
  • Mémoire vive : 1 GB de mémoire
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 200 MB d'espace disque disponible
  • Notes supplémentaires : Bande-passante de 5Mbps pour 540p, 3Mbps pour 360p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 10
  • Processeur : Un processeur Intel Core I3+ ou l'équivalent d'AMD est recommandé pour une lecture en HD 1080p
  • Mémoire vive : 2 GB de mémoire
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 500 MB d'espace disque disponible
  • Notes supplémentaires : Bande-passante de 12Mbps pour 1080p ou 8Mbps pour 720p
